duties_responsibilities.duty: Transport patients to various areas of the Medical Center under the direction of a Patient Escort Dispatcher.
Assist patients by moving them from Point A to Point B, considering their medical condition and comfort.
Communicate effectively with cancer patients, their families, doctors, and nurses.
Provide excellent customer service and work as part of a team to ensure patient care and comfort.
On feet bending, walking, standing for long periods of time, and working quickly under pressure.
